com.bizosys.hsearch.index
Class IdMapping

java.lang.Object
  com.bizosys.hsearch.index.IdMapping

public class IdMapping
extends java.lang.Object

As multiple data format can be stored, an internal unique key is generated. This unique key is based on the stored "bucket Id" and "Document Serial number" inside the bucket. This class defines the mapping relationship amoing the original key and the created bucket + serial key.

Author:
karan
